content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5, y=-53.5 and x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel to operate.
- Examples: burner-mining-drill, burner-inserter

### Errors when using inserter entities
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items to operate.
- Example: burner-inserter

### Errors when using furnace entities
- Ensure that furnace entities have ingredients to operate.
- Example: stone-furnace

### Errors when using steam engine entities
- Ensure that steam engine entities are connected to the electric network.
- Example: steam-engine

### Errors when using pipe group entities
- Ensure that pipe group entities are not empty.
- Examples: pipe-group

### Errors when using electricity group entities
- Ensure that electricity group entities are plugged into the electric network.
- Example: electricity-group

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
